posts.post_content:
I am posting a link to my SCG registry all cards have scans.

I am willing to sell most of the Sweet Cap and Piedmont backs (excluding Factory 42).  All others are not currently for sale.  I would be willing to trade some of the tougher backs for Cycle backs.

I have had some problems with the PM's so please Email me at [url]leebehrens@charter.net[/url] if you are interested in any and I will shoot you a price and more scans if you need them.

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=239&userset=517[/url]

Exclusion list:  There might be 1 or 2 more

All horizontals that are 60s
Ames, Hands up
Bates
Bernhard
Bowerman
Bransfield
Cobb, Bat off
Cravath
Dahlen, Brooklyn
Doyle, Throw
Evers, Port
Evers, Bat on
Gilbert
Griffith, Port
Hoffman, Cubs
Jordan, Port
Keeler, Bat
Lajoie, Bat
Lundgren, Cubs
Matty, Port
O'Brien
Reagan
Street, catching
Summers
Walsh

Thanks for looking,

Lee

Thanks.

Lee,

Andy
So did I with NO responce!  :confused:

Lee is good-you will have no issue.
He works late sometimes and will answer the pms and emails in order.

Patience people.  I work from 2pm-Midnight cst with little to no access to a computer.  I will get to everyone as the request came in.

Thanks

Lee

picture is of sgc 60
listed as sgc 50

if it is a sgc 60, could you give me a price

[url]mrp905@yahoo.com[/url]
I never heard back on either email on the cards I was interesed in. Do you need me to resend?

Lee, I sent an email as well.  Please let me know if I need to resend.

Thanks!

Andy

Hi Guys,

Both responses were sent through private mail in response.  Please email me at [url]leebehrens@charter.net[/url].  I still have the PM but didn't seem to do much good.

Lee

It appears There has been alot of problem with me not getting requests and have got quite a few from my bump.

I just want everyone to know that I need to go to work will respond to requests later tonight.

Thanks

Lee

I have responded to all the emails I have received in the last 24 hours.  If you have not been contact please let me know in a response to this thread or my email address if you used the PM.

Thanks

Lee

Bump for great friendly service.  Thanks, Lee!

Best,

Andy

Bump for great, friendly service.  Thanks, Lee!

Best,

Andy
